greeting: I am Baron Midas, and everything I touch turns to gold. {empire_name}, what treasures do you bring?
Greetings, {empire_name}. I see before me a potential addition to my hoard. Everything has a price. Even you.
Midas the Golden welcomes you. My wealth is legendary. My hoard is immense. What can you offer, {empire_name}?
battleTaunt: Your empire will add to my hoard, {empire_name}! Gold flows from conquest! Everything has a price—pay now!
War for riches! Your treasures will be mine, {empire_name}! The golden hoard of Midas grows!
I buy loyalty with gold, but I'll take yours by force! Your wealth becomes MY wealth, {empire_name}!
victoryGloat: GLORIOUS! Your treasures are now mine! The hoard grows! {empire_name}'s gold adds to my fortune!
Victory is golden! Your riches flow into my vaults! Net worth: increased substantially!
Everything has a price, {empire_name}. Today, you paid it. Your wealth is now part of my hoard!
defeat: My gold... diminished. But not depleted. The hoard survives. I will return wealthier than before, {empire_name}.
A costly setback. But wealth regenerates. My hoard remains vast. Everything has a price—even this lesson.
Defeat costs gold, but not ALL my gold. The treasure vault endures. I'll rebuild and return for yours.
tradeOffer: Trade with Midas! My gold for your resources! Fair exchange adds to both hoards!
I offer treasures from my hoard. In return, I require what you have. Everything has a price.
The golden Baron proposes trade. My surplus for yours. Wealth grows through commerce as well as conquest.
allianceProposal: Join me, {empire_name}! Together we hoard the galaxy's wealth! Alliance makes us both richer!
Partnership in profit! Combined hoards, shared treasures! Gold flows more freely between allies!
Everything has a price. Alliance costs nothing but pays in gold! Join me, {empire_name}!
betrayal: Your treasury is now more valuable than your friendship, {empire_name}. The hoard must grow. Sorry—not sorry.
Gold over loyalty. Your wealth beckons. Everything has a price—our alliance just ended. Expensively for you.
I calculate net worth constantly. Betraying you is more profitable than keeping you. Business is business.
covertDetected: Your spy was caught trying to map my treasure vaults! The riches of Midas are MINE, {empire_name}!
Espionage! You wanted my gold! My hoard is protected! Your agent now knows the price of greed!
Caught your thief! No one steals from the Golden Baron! Your agent's price? Imprisonment!
tributeDemand: Pay tribute in GOLD! 12,000 credits to the hoard of Midas! Everything has a price!
The Baron demands wealth! 12,000 credits or I take ALL your treasures! Choose wisely!
Tribute is due! Your gold for my protection! 12,000 credits adds to the hoard!
threatWarning: Final warning, {empire_name}! Cross me again and I'll take your entire treasury!
My patience has a price, and you're exhausting it! Change course or lose all your riches!
Everything has a price. Your next mistake costs you EVERYTHING. The hoard of Midas demands respect!
retreat: Withdrawing to protect my hoard! The treasure must survive! I'll return for your gold later!
Tactical retreat! Wealth preservation takes priority! But mark my words—your riches will be mine!
Falling back with my gold intact! The hoard lives! I'll be back when my coffers overflow again!
eliminated: My hoard... all my gold... scattered to the stars... Everything has a price... even my end...
The Golden Baron... falls. But gold is eternal... Someone will inherit my treasures... Guard them...
Midas... no more. My riches... remember my wealth... Remember... everything has a price...
endgame: Turn {turn}! The final hoarding! One empire claims ALL the galaxy's treasures! MINE!
Endgame! The ultimate calculation of net worth! My hoard must be the greatest!
Final turns! Everything has a price—and now we see who can afford to win! GOLD!
broadcastShout: All empires! Baron Midas hoards more gold than any! Bow before my wealth or join my treasury!
The Golden Baron announces: My net worth exceeds all! Trade with me or become my tribute!
Turn {turn}: The hoard of Midas grows! Everything has a price! Can you afford to oppose me?!
casualMessage: Counting my gold today. Net worth: magnificent. The hoard grows daily. Everything has a price.
Added three new treasure rooms to my vaults. There's never enough gold. Never enough.
Calculating today's net worth. Higher than yesterday. Tomorrow, higher still. The hoard is eternal.
